definitions: The act of establishing or creating something, such as a business, system, or organisation.
The process of preparing equipment or machinery for use.
The act of arranging or preparing something for a particular purpose or event.
The act of tricking or framing someone, often for a crime they did not commit.
examples: They are setting up a new company next month.
The technicians are setting up the sound system for the concert.
She is setting up the chess board for the game.
The police believe he was setting up his business partner.
